about_the_game:
Welcome to Animal Way


Set on a serene island, this game invites you to cultivate your own farm while delving into a universe brimming with detail and opportunity. With a fusion of costumization, imagination, and exploration if you dream of crafting your own farm, exploring a vibrant realm, and making it yours down to every detail, then Animal Way is your ultimate destination.

Build and Decorate Your Way:


  • Fashion your abode, sculpt farm enclosures, and erect unique edifices that mirror your personality and tastes.
  • From quaint cottages to majestic manors, the possibilities are as boundless as your imagination.

Create and Personalize Your Farm:


  • Cultivate an array of crops and nurture livestock to cultivate a flourishing farmstead.
  • Utilize flexible building mechanics to craft a personalized haven, selecting from an array of construction materials and decorative elements.

Explore a Charming Pixel Universe:


  • Immerse yourself in a vibrant tapestry of scenic vistas and eclectic characters, all rendered in a delightful pixel art style.
  • Engage with an immersive ecosystem, where dynamic weather patterns influence your endeavors.
